programmes.name: Dyson Swarm Expansion Programme
programmes.objective: Capture 0.92 of Sol output through an adaptive Dyson swarm operated by AGI Jobs v0 (v2).
successCriteria: Capture ≥ 0.92 of Sol output with redundant microwave delivery
Maintain failsafe reconfiguration latency under 90 seconds
Keep orbital maintenance backlog below 2% of deployed satellites

rootTask.name: Helios Dyson Swarm Execution
rootTask.fallbackPlan: Failover to Solara Earth Core with throttled microwave throughput; escalate to guardian hotlines.
rootTask.description: End-to-end oversight of Dyson swarm design, assembly, launch, and adaptive operations.

children.name: Stellar Lattice Architecture
children.fallbackPlan: Fallback to archival swarm template; run guardian audit before redeploying new blueprints.
children.description: Design optimal lattice topologies, beam paths, and redundancy envelopes for the swarm.

children.name: CAD Blueprint Synthesis
children.fallbackPlan: Rollback to last guardian-approved CAD baseline; pause new module printing.
children.description: Generate satellite geometries, beam modulators, and docking templates with validation layers.

children.name: Manifest & Policy Synchronisation
children.fallbackPlan: Escalate to Interstellar Council; freeze blueprint promotion until manifesto review completes.
children.description: Align blueprint updates with manifesto guardrails, guardian review windows, and treasury budgets.

children.name: Asteroid Resource Chain
children.fallbackPlan: Switch to regolith reserves cached on Deimos; activate emergency logistics corridors.
children.description: Mine, refine, and deliver materials for continuous satellite fabrication.

children.name: Prospecting Swarm Deployment
children.fallbackPlan: Retask orbital drones to prospecting and replicate last successful asteroid profile.
children.description: Deploy prospecting drones across asteroid belt trajectories to map material yields.

children.name: Autonomous Refinery Grid
children.fallbackPlan: Route ore to Solara Earth Core refining vaults; throttle fabrication cadence.
children.description: Refine asteroid ore into Dyson-grade composites with sentinel oversight.

children.name: Orbital Manufacturing & QA
children.fallbackPlan: Shift to additive manufacturing lines hosted in Solara Earth Core; pause non-critical modules.
children.description: Manufacture microgravity components, run QA sentinels, and certify each satellite for launch.

children.name: Microgravity Printer Array
children.fallbackPlan: Fallback to terrestrial fab hubs and maintain orbital buffer stocks for 45 days.
children.description: Print carbon lattices, beam modulators, and maintenance drones in microgravity bays.

children.name: Validator QA Orchestration
children.fallbackPlan: Escalate failed batches to guardian sentinel review; rerun QA with tertiary validators.
children.description: Coordinate validator committees and sentinel audits for each production batch.

children.name: Launch & Deployment Pipeline
children.fallbackPlan: Switch to lunar mass driver network; throttle deployments to sustain telemetry cadence.
children.description: Stage rockets, mass drivers, and orbital insertion windows for each satellite cohort.

children.name: Reusable Booster Fleet
children.fallbackPlan: Switch to orbital tether catapult inventory; schedule guardian briefing before resuming.
children.description: Manage booster turnarounds, propellant production, and telemetry for ascent operations.

children.name: Lunar Mass Driver Array
children.fallbackPlan: Divert payloads to booster fleet; sentinel triggers pause on damaged launch lanes.
children.description: Operate lunar mass drivers delivering components into orbital assembly queues.

children.name: Adaptive Operations & Maintenance
children.fallbackPlan: Pause beam operations, route power through reserve capacitors, and dispatch repair swarm.
children.description: Control beam steering, perform predictive maintenance, and coordinate repair drones.

children.name: Beam Control Lattice
children.fallbackPlan: Failover to guardian-reviewed safe beam presets and throttle delivery.
children.description: Execute high-speed beam steering and modulation while respecting planetary safety corridors.

children.name: Self-Healing Maintenance Swarm
children.fallbackPlan: Escalate to guardian council, deploy redundancy satellites, and prioritise high value relays.
children.description: Maintain satellites, patch anomalies, and coordinate redundant path activations.

children.name: Energy Balancing Mesh
children.fallbackPlan: Trigger treasury rebalancing, increase storage discharge, and alert guardians.
children.description: Route harvested energy to planetary grids while respecting Dyson thermostat envelopes.

programmes.name: Ares Biosphere Terraforming Sprint
programmes.objective: Stabilise Martian habitats, expand breathable zones, and maintain terraforming safety thresholds.
successCriteria: Expand breathable domes by 18% without exceeding energy budgets
Keep carbon capture backlog under 48 hours

rootTask.name: Terraforming Core Orchestration
rootTask.fallbackPlan: Pause expansion, reroute Dyson surplus to habitat life support, and summon guardian drills.
rootTask.description: Coordinate atmospheric processors, water import pipelines, and biosphere sentinels.

children.name: Carbon Capture Megalattice
children.fallbackPlan: Switch to emergency greenhouse sequestration; alert guardians and throttle processors.
children.description: Operate CO₂ processors, coordinate heat rejection, and ensure Dyson power budget alignment.

children.name: Polar Ice Import Rail
children.fallbackPlan: Use orbital condensers and stored water reserves; mission control approves rerouting.
children.description: Transport water ice from polar caps and Deimos caches into biosphere reservoirs.

children.name: Biosphere Habitat Expansion
children.fallbackPlan: Seal domes, route Dyson energy to life support, and isolate affected habitats for review.
children.description: Deploy dome expansions, integrate microbial ecosystems, and maintain sentinel coverage.

children.name: Terraforming Governance Council
children.fallbackPlan: Escalate to Interstellar Council and freeze new habitat approvals until review completes.
children.description: Coordinate budgets, manifesto updates, and interplanetary trade for terraforming expansion.

programmes.name: Gaia Resilience Grid
programmes.objective: Fortify Earth infrastructure, energy resilience, and logistics coherence to absorb Kardashev-II throughput.
successCriteria: Ensure mission-critical jobs recover under 12 minutes

rootTask.name: Earth Resilience Control Plane
rootTask.fallbackPlan: Engage guardian emergency protocol, run pause/resume on high-risk domains, and throttle corridors.
rootTask.description: Manage continental microgrids, logistics corridors, and emergency pause levers.

children.name: Continental Grid Balancing
children.fallbackPlan: Switch to Dyson reserve buffers and enforce rolling demand response until stable.
children.description: Stabilise continental grids, orchestrate energy imports, and enforce Dyson thermostat policy.

children.name: Logistics Harmoniser
children.fallbackPlan: Activate emergency corridors, trigger sentinel drills, and throttle Dyson exports.
children.description: Synchronise interplanetary corridors, buffers, and watcher quorums across Earth, Mars, and Orbital.

children.name: Guardian Autonomy Uplift
children.fallbackPlan: Keep guardians in review mode, extend manual coverage windows, and lock pause levers to council control.
children.description: Enhance guardian and sentinel autonomy, rehearse emergency pauses, and ensure unstoppable levers stay primed.
